trans-unit.source: Changing the oil in your car

seg-source.mrk: Changing the oil in your car

target.mrk: Changing the oil in your car

trans-unit.source: Once every 6000 kilometers or three months, change the oil in your car.

seg-source.mrk: Once every 6000 kilometers or three months, change the oil in your car.

target.mrk: Once every 6000 kilometers or three months, change the oil in your car.

trans-unit.source: Changing the oil regularly will help keep the engine in good condition.

seg-source.mrk: Changing the oil regularly will help keep the engine in good condition.

target.mrk: Changing the oil regularly will help keep the engine in good condition.

trans-unit.source: Install a new oil filter and gasket.

seg-source.mrk: Install a new oil filter and gasket.

target.mrk: Install a new oil filter and gasket.

trans-unit.source: Add new oil to the engine.

seg-source.mrk: Add new oil to the engine.

target.mrk: Add new oil to the engine.

trans-unit.source: Check the air filter and replace or clean it.

seg-source.mrk: Check the air filter and replace or clean it.

target.mrk: Check the air filter and replace or clean it.

trans-unit.source: Top up the windshield washer fluid.

seg-source.mrk: Top up the windshield washer fluid.

target.mrk: Top up the windshield washer fluid.
